The doc, which was made for the occasion of Attenborough’s 90th birthday, was shot over seven years and follows him as he travels to Borneo, Morocco and the Galapagos to shoot wildlife specials. Anthony Geffen, the CEO of Atlantic Productions, commented, “This is such a special Attenborough film because unusually he is the subject. As I look back over the last seven years, I never fail to be amazed by his extraordinary ambition and drive to use the very latest technology to communicate the natural world to audiences around the globe. This film gives audiences the chance to see what it’s like to be on the road with David.”","popularity":3.561,"poster_path":"/zR9ySn9KgkBTblzrXi1SSNTnxAO.jpg","release_date":"2016-04-30","title":"Attenborough at 90: Behind the Lens","video":false,"vote_average":8.4,"vote_count":7},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[99,10751],"id":1029985,"original_language":"en","original_title":"Cell phones P.s. Over a phone call, she recites an email she wrote seven years prior.","popularity":0.969,"poster_path":"/o81NA64CXkDq8FXVJZGdOUKjIom.jpg","release_date":"2022-09-02","title":"Cell phones P.s. Just a small add on","video":false,"vote_average":10.0,"vote_count":1},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/aCO2cuBZNnjufanDWVkxnfYhuYp.jpg","genre_ids":[99,10402],"id":866617,"original_language":"he","original_title":"המלכה שושנה","overview":"Shoshana Damari was the first Israeli diva. She graced local and international stages, stirring millions with her beguiling voice and spectacular performance. Yet behind the larger-than-life persona and her memorable songs was a woman about whom we know little. She didn’t like to be interviewed and never volunteered details about herself and her family. Hers was the life of a Hollywood legend and she paid the price for it. This is a story about fame and loneliness, acclaim and loss, daring and compromise. For the first time, the woman behind the crown, the cloak and the palace will come to light.","popularity":5.562,"poster_path":"/fFOyYie187Tm3QGPQ8RdQgKcv8M.jpg","release_date":"2021-07-03","title":"המלכה שושנה","video":false,"vote_average":9.0,"vote_count":1},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[99],"id":551391,"original_language":"cs","original_title":"Archa světel a stínů","overview":"The forgotten story of Martin and Osa Johnson, rebel filmmakers and Kansas natives who made some of the first films in Africa in times when filming itself was more dangerous than lions or malaria.","popularity":0.762,"poster_path":"/tvNhWvLMVsl3yzFwgpW8e4GMNNU.jpg","release_date":"2018-03-17","title":"The Ark of Lights and Shadows","video":false,"vote_average":0.0,"vote_count":0},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[99,18],"id":705485,"original_language":"es","original_title":"Kunstkammer","overview":"","popularity":0.445,"poster_path":null,"release_date":"2014-06-12","title":"Kunstkammer","video":false,"vote_average":5.0,"vote_count":1},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/aE9u2m6SVSu8bPJwPIeZStDe7NC.jpg","genre_ids":[99],"id":1186724,"original_language":"fr","original_title":"Qui êtes vous Mr. Iguerbouchène ?","overview":"Mohamed Iguerbouchène was born on February 7, 1907 in Aït-Ouchen in Algeria. He left for England in 1923 where he studied music and harmony. Subsequently, he went to Vienna, Austria, to learn piano techniques where he won 1st prize in harmony and piano. Mohamed Iguerbouchen became a composer, he composed four symphonies and several film scores including the famous “Pépé le Moko” (1937) with Jean Gabin. Mohamed Iguerbouchène bowed out on August 21, 1966 following a long illness.","popularity":1.63,"poster_path":"/t9Wo7HooCUJuk1UIJwhysXHwAeG.jpg","release_date":"2014-01-01","title":"Qui êtes vous Mr. Iguerbouchène ?","video":false,"vote_average":10.0,"vote_count":1},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[99],"id":1034020,"original_language":"de","original_title":"Aufstieg am Mount Everest","overview":"27-year-old German alpinist Jost Kobusch wants to climb Everest, alone, without oxygen and in Winter, when the roof of the world is deserted.","popularity":3.706,"poster_path":null,"release_date":"2020-05-06","title":"Tackling the World's Highest Peak","video":false,"vote_average":0.0,"vote_count":0},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[80,18,99],"id":399115,"original_language":"de","original_title":"Fegefeuer","overview":"The story of Austrian, Johann \"Jack\" Unterweger, who wrote a book about his criminal past while serving a life term in prison for assault. In 1974, Unterweger murdered 18-year-old German citizen Margaret Schäfer by strangling her with her own bra, and in 1976 was arrested and sentenced to life in prison.","popularity":1.069,"poster_path":"/jsmzrKy9lD6hRaDQAFdVIKgs5yi.jpg","release_date":"1988-01-01","title":"Fegefeuer","video":false,"vote_average":6.5,"vote_count":4},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[99],"id":549520,"original_language":"en","original_title":"The Temple Builder","overview":"Californian artist David Best is pioneering a new kind of art where creative and emotive interaction is integral to his work. Then the story begins.","popularity":0.695,"poster_path":null,"release_date":"1994-01-01","title":"So I Sleepwalk in Broad Daylight","video":false,"vote_average":0.0,"vote_count":0},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/1t11FBDabS7hVWjdfg0ttCiFaiF.jpg","genre_ids":[99,10402],"id":233863,"original_language":"en","original_title":"Jimi Hendrix: Hear My Train a Comin'","overview":"An account of the short life of genius musician Jimi Hendrix (1942-70), probably the most talented and influential guitarist of the twentieth century: his humble beginnings in Seattle, his time in New York, his rise to fame in swinging London… Live fast, love hard, die young.","popularity":4.919,"poster_path":"/8dMu2RFdYEBb8Ob136Jq9Z8tQ0w.jpg","release_date":"2013-11-04","title":"Jimi Hendrix: Hear My Train a Comin'","video":false,"vote_average":7.4,"vote_count":29},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[99],"id":704207,"original_language":"en","original_title":"Being Marcus","overview":"Marcus Pabon-Lara loves swimming but is too self-conscious to take off his top in public. Will a mastectomy give him the body confidence needed to go for his first swim since he was a teenager? An honest insight into the experiences of a Deaf trans man, follows self-proclaimed “proud geek” Marcus during the lead up to his much-anticipated operation. Along the way, we meet his friends and his mother, finding out more about Marcus and how he feels about his transition.","popularity":0.248,"poster_path":"/lHVIotYnmZhjlOTfiFclzwF5yGF.jpg","release_date":"2019-05-01","title":"Being Marcus","video":false,"vote_average":0.0,"vote_count":0},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/7x2SiC19XmQ84gsYcaNDmFxiVi6.jpg","genre_ids":[99,18,10402],"id":865149,"original_language":"en","original_title":"Boome Satellites in Texas","overview":"Satellites in Texas is a feature documentary following musician Boome as he copes with his brothers sudden death. Faced by hard decisions to continue to pursue his dream, Boome takes us on the road.","popularity":1.421,"poster_path":"/q5TSWwyGYxuiW2r269WEYhxtqB0.jpg","release_date":"2021-07-24","title":"Boome Satellites in Texas","video":false,"vote_average":10.0,"vote_count":1},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/ozMa9EahMCkkNGulT4OdBhP0Cd.jpg","genre_ids":[99],"id":865552,"original_language":"de","original_title":"Jean-Michel Frank – Tragisches Genie des Art déco","overview":"Jean-Michel Frank designed style-defining interiors in the 1920s with the timeless ideal of simplicity. He worked in Paris with artists like Giacometti and Dali, and designed interiors for millionaires like Nelson Rockefeller and Templeton Crocker. The documentary tells of an amazing but tragic life of the innovative interior designer.","popularity":1.638,"poster_path":"/6a7G5ahYEtNJmM3ZJsExMcngVCP.jpg","release_date":"2021-08-22","title":"Jean-Michel Frank - Tragic Genius of Art Deco","video":false,"vote_average":0.0,"vote_count":0},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[99],"id":865255,"original_language":"sk","original_title":"Fraňo Kráľ","overview":"","popularity":0.611,"poster_path":null,"release_date":"1954-01-01","title":"Fraňo Kráľ","video":false,"vote_average":0.0,"vote_count":0},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/7TCu1JReevJoyGrrcnb6uTID0pN.jpg","genre_ids":[99],"id":1028743,"original_language":"fr","original_title":"La traversée de Bourvil","overview":"September 23, 2022 marks the 52nd anniversary of the death of Bourvil (1917-1970). Radio, sketches, boulevard theater, operetta, cinema, songs whimsical or tender, Bourvil is present in all areas of popular culture. Carried by the voice of Valérie Lemercier, this portrait of the artist allows us to rediscover his most beautiful songs, from Les Crayons to La Tendresse, and the highlights of his filmography, from the cult scenes of La Traversée de Paris, Le Corniaud and La Grande Vadrouille to Le Cercle rouge. We also rediscover the richness of his career as a singer and actor, with some little known nuggets. The testimony of Bourvil's two sons, unpublished family films and numerous archives tell the story of the all too brief life of this endearing man.","popularity":5.796,"poster_path":"/gyoVpU92WpNFpvBz8csXVumJofa.jpg","release_date":"2022-09-23","title":"La traversée de Bourvil","video":false,"vote_average":9.0,"vote_count":1},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[99],"id":237844,"original_language":"en","original_title":"Bill Gates A Tycoon Story","overview":"","popularity":1.145,"poster_path":"/mtfv0OanXa2IADKbpwcZQIf62nj.jpg","release_date":"2012-01-01","title":"Bill Gates A Tycoon Story","video":false,"vote_average":6.0,"vote_count":1}],"total_pages":8573,"total_results":171456}
